- Added two widgets: NicEditWidget, NicEditAdminWidget

=== 0.21 ===
- PIL -> Pillow

=== 0.22 ===

- niceEdit options can now be set in widget init method
- added example of admin widget usage
- updated js code

- docs improvements
- support for django 1.6
- updated AUTHORS
